content.raw:
I found some issues with `atlas_irobot_hands` and `atlas_irobot_hands_bringup` launchfiles, as well as with sandia_hands, that were causing the xml syntax errors Carlos was seeing. Fix is in branch [reorganize_launch_files_jackie](#!/osrf/drcsim/branch/reorganize_launch_files_jackie)

I also had an issue where Gazebo couldn't find the iRobot hand meshes. Will investigate further.
content.html:
I found some issues with atlas_irobot_hands and atlas_irobot_hands_bringup launchfiles, as well as with sandia_hands, that were causing the xml syntax errors Carlos was seeing. Fix is in branch reorganize_launch_files_jackie

I also had an issue where Gazebo couldn't find the iRobot hand meshes. Will investigate further.
